field.comment: The system this relation belongs to
field.name: cdmSystemId

field.comment: An optional relation type, for instance it might be the role a user has within an organisation
field.name: relationType

field.comment: The name of the identifier used to figure out which instance we are related to, for example "email"
field.name: name

field.comment: The identifier value, for example the actual email address for a user
field.name: identifier

field.comment: The definition this relates to. For instance a user might have a relation to a company
field.name: cdmDefinitionId

field.comment: The source instance of the relation
field.name: sourceId

field.comment: The target instance of the relation (if we know it)
field.name: targetId

field.comment: Whether or not this relation is active
field.name: active
